name: Nexus Flow Leggings
fit_advice: Fits true to size but compressive. Size up if you prefer a relaxed waist.

name: Velocity Running Short
fit_advice: Runs slightly small in the hips. Recommended for slim builds.
description: Lightweight lined shorts with a zippered phone pocket.

name: Core Performance Tee
fit_advice: Tailored fit around chest and arms. True to size.
description: Odor-resistant breathable t-shirt designed for high-intensity training.

name: Infinity Sports Bra
fit_advice: Runs very small. Definitely size up one full size.
description: Medium support sports bra with a strappy back design.

name: Recovery Hoodie
fit_advice: Intentionally baggy. Size down if you want a standard fit.
description: Heavyweight oversized hoodie with a fleece lining.

name: Sprint Grip Socks
description: Crew socks with silicone grip pads on the sole.
